ygData.subject: Where to hunt at level 27
ygData.msgSnippet: It has taken far too long, but I am slowly reaching the plateau of level 27.  Once I have it I will be the very happy singer of Solon s Song of the Sirens.
ygData.messageBody:
It has taken far too long, but I am slowly reaching the plateau of level
27. Once I have it I will be the very happy singer of Solon's Song of the
Sirens. So, this brings me to my question, where can I find a good place
for me to play charm the mob to gain experience by myself or in a very
small group? I have adventured in many places, but would prefer to find a
place that is relatively safe for me. Ie. I don't have to die alot since
I have a knack for that and minimizing my chances of dying would be
greatly appreciated.

Treilanin Loreweaver (almost level 27)
Bard of Kelethin
Honour Guard, Karana

/em knocks on wood
/em knocks on wood
